comment:
* Scrambling Status event sent from {@link Filter} objects with Scrambling Status type. * *

This event is only sent in Tuner 1.1 or higher version. Use * {@link TunerVersionChecker#getTunerVersion()} to get the version information. * * @hide

methods.name: public int getScramblingStatus()
methods.comment:
* Gets Scrambling Status Type. * *

This event field is only sent in Tuner 1.1 or higher version. Use * {@link TunerVersionChecker#getTunerVersion()} to get the version information.
